sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个名词都表示"困难"之意。
means: difficulty ： 指需大量思考和技巧或努力才能克服的任何困难。
hardship ： 侧重指生活上令人难以承受的艰难困苦，如疾病、贫穷等磨难。

sentence.Network_en: He was going red in the face and breathing with difficulty.
sentence.Network_cn: 他涨红了脸，费力地喘着气。

sentence.Network_en: Many men still have difficulty accepting a woman as a business partner.
sentence.Network_cn: 许多男性仍然无法接受女性商业伙伴。

sentence.Network_en: Something gave me the strength to overcome the difficulty.
sentence.Network_cn: 有些事给了我克服困难的勇气。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 初中英语单词表 - 豆丁网 ... difficult a. 难的；艰难的；不易相处的 difficulty n. 困难，费力 dinner n. 正餐，宴会.
难度 (Difficulty) 简单说是指测验的难易程度 , 通常是以题目的通过率来表示大小的 , 通过率是指被试正确回答或通过题目的人数与所.
难字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 难得〖 hardtocomeby〗 难点〖 difficulty〗 难懂〖 difficulttocomprehend〗.
人教版高中英语必修5单词表_百度知道 ... face   vt. 面临;面对;正视 difficulty   n. 困难;难事 nosy   adj. 爱管闲事的.

list.abs: 雅思写作词汇分类 - 豆丁网 ... substitute 取代 41. overcome difficulties 克服困难 42. make progress 取得进步 43.
大学英语四级常用词组 ... make a difference 有影响，有关系 in difficulties 处境困难 make no difficulties 不留难；表示无异议.
英语中有哪些in开头的短语_百度知道 ... in the charge of … 由…管 in difficulties… 有困难,处境困难, in case 万一.
心理学专业词汇翻译辞典 - MBA智库文档 ... learning cycle 学习周期 learning difficulty 学习困难 learning dilemma 学习困境.
2010年中考英语日常交际用语2_英语网 ... 28.求救 Calling for help 29.语言困难 Language difficulties a.喜悦 Pleasure，Joy.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the senses 'requiring effort or skill' and 'something difficult'): from Latin difficultas, from dis- (expressing reversal) + facultas 'ability, opportunity'

encyclopedia.content: 基本含义简明英汉词典 difficulty [5difikElti] n. 困难， 难点美国传统词典（双解） difficulty dif.fi.cul.ty AHD:[d¹f“¹-k¾l”t¶, -k…l-] D.J.['difikəlti] K.K.['dɪfə,kʌltɪ] n.（名词） 【复数】 dif.fi.cul.ties The condition or quality of being difficult: 困难：困难的环境或程序： the difficulty of a task. 艰巨的任务 Some

example.ex: The country is facing great economic difficulties.
example.tran: 该国正面临巨大的经济困难。

entry.def: If you have difficulty doing something, you are not able to do it easily.

example.ex: Do you have difficulty getting up?...
The injured man mounted his horse with difficulty.
example.tran: 受伤的男子艰难地上了马。

entry.def: If you are in difficulty or in difficulties, you are having a lot of problems.

example.ex: You have to admit that you are, in fact, in difficulties...
example.tran: 你不得不承认，你事实上是陷入了困境。

example.ex: Rumours spread about banks being in difficulty.
example.tran: 有传闻称银行现在处境艰难。

sentences.sentence: "I went to a lot of trouble"
"finished the test only with great difficulty"

means.word_mean: 2. a factor causing trouble in achieving a positive result or tending to produce a negative result;

sentences.sentence: "serious difficulties were encountered in obtaining a pure reagent"

means.word_mean: 3. a condition or state of affairs almost beyond one's ability to deal with and requiring great effort to bear or overcome;

sentences.sentence: "they agreed about the difficulty of the climb"

auth_sentence.content: The difficulty here is maintaining interest in the music.
auth_sentence.res_content: The difficulty here is maintaining interest in the music.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The difficulty here is maintaining interest in the music.

auth_sentence.content: I'm having difficulty following this train of thought.
auth_sentence.res_content: I'm having difficulty following this train of thought.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I'm having difficulty following this train of thought.

auth_sentence.content: Now that gets me into all kinds of difficulty.
auth_sentence.res_content: Now that gets me into all kinds of difficulty.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Now that gets me into all kinds of difficulty.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"人或小东西",常带有嬉谑性或爱称; 2. 表名词,加在形容词或r结尾的单词后,通常表示为"状态,性质等"; 3. 表形容词,加在名词后,表示"……的"

stems_affixes.word_buile: fat肥大的+y人或小东西→fatty胖子
daint+y状态,性质等→n.精美食品 adj.娇美的,挑剔的
craze狂热+y……的→crazy疯狂的
fault犯错误+y……的→adj.有过失的,有缺点的
flint极硬的东西,燧石+y……的→adj.极坚硬的
greed贪欲,贪婪+y……的→adj.贪吃的,贪婪的,渴望的
guilt罪行,内疚+y……的→adj.犯罪的,有罪的,心虚的
hill小山,丘陵+y……的→adj.多小山的;丘陵起伏的
rain雨+y……的→adj.下雨的,多雨的
sleep睡+y……的→adj.想睡的;寂静的
stead=stand站+y……的→adj.稳固的,稳定的
wind风+y……的→adj.多风的,刮风的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 多树木的,木本的,木头般的,木制的
stems_affixes.word_buile: wood木+y……的→adj.多树木的,木本的,木头般的,木制的
dog狗+y人或小东西→doggy小狗
fat肥大的+y人或小东西→fatty胖子
gran奶奶+y人或小东西→granny
kit猫+y人或小东西→kitty小猫
miss小姐,姑娘+y人或小东西→n.少女,小姑娘
old老的+y人或小东西→n.老人,陈旧之物

stems_affixes.value_cn: 矮子,特别短的东西[尤指衣,裤]
stems_affixes.word_buile: short短的+y人或小东西→矮子
batter接连重击+y状态,性质等→殴打
daint+y状态,性质等→n.精美食品 adj.娇美的,挑剔的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 投递,送交;交付,交货;分娩
stems_affixes.word_buile: deliver递送+y状态,性质等→投递,送交
difficult困难的+y状态,性质等→n.困难,困境,难题
discover发现,发觉+y状态,性质等→n.发现;被发现的事物
flatter阿谀,奉承+y状态,性质等→n.谄媚,阿谀,巴结,奉承
harmon+y状态,性质等→n.协调,融洽
inquire打听,询问+y状态,性质等→n.[enquiry]询问,打听,调查
jealous嫉妒的+y状态,性质等→n.妒忌,嫉妒,猜忌

stems_affixes.value_cn: 控制权,统治权;精通,掌握
stems_affixes.word_buile: master掌握+y状态,性质等→n.控制权,统治权;精通,掌握
recover恢复,痊愈+y状态,性质等→n.恢复,痊愈,防御

Sentence.sentence: Many people still have difficulty using them.
Why do large companies have difficulty switching to new markets
Giving little attention to those having difficulty learning.
have difficulty learning to handle the devices
He has difficulty finding affordable housing.
Our brains respond better to difficulty than we imagine

jushi.english: Have you any concrete thoughts on how to deal with this difficulty?
jushi.chinese: 对于应付这种困难,你有什么具体想法?

jushi.english: The mountain climbers had to battle against great difficulties.
jushi.chinese: 登山队员不得不与艰难险阻搏斗。

jushi.english: Our difficulties are many, to begin with, we can't get the workers.
jushi.chinese: 我们有许多困难,首要的是我们招不来工人。
